boardgame.name: Chrononauts
boardgame.description: In Chrononauts, each player becomes a time traveler, with a unique identity and a secret mission. During the game, players travel backwards and forwards through history, doing all those things people have always dreamed of using a time machine to do: Visiting the great moments of the past, peeking into the future, collecting up impossible artifacts and priceless works of art (at the moment just before history records their destruction), coming to grips with the paradoxes of time travel, and of course, changing pivotal events and altering the course of history itself. How would the timeline be different if Lincoln and JFK had not been assassinated? And is that the version of reality that you came from originally...the one you must return to in order to win? It's all packed into a fast and easy Fluxx-style card game that will take you to the beginning of time and back again._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Completely new and still in shrink wrap. All orders shipped via CanadaPost. Shipping cost in Canada is approximately $5-$10 depending on exact location. All shipping is guaranteed and tracking numbers for the shipment will be provided. Please have a look at our other listings on our website at www.starlitcitadel.com. Shipping costs is often significantly lower when purchasing more than one game. International orders, please inquire about shipping costs through email before ordering. Please provide zip code or other postal code information for exact rates that will be charged. Canadian residents should note that we are based in Richmond, BC and must by law charged PST (if you are based in BC) and GST (if you are in Canada). Feel free to e-mail if you have any other inquiries. Thank you! Tao Wong Starlit Citadel

This game has never been played! I bought it a few years ago and it has just never made it to the table. I will also include the Chrononauts: Lost Identities expansion for free! Shipping is $3.00 in USA.

Still in its shrink, this is a great game to learn history (even if it is “alternate” history), while having a blast. I have a copy already, but then won a second copy. I just don’t need a second one. I’ll ship anywhere in the continental U.S. for $5, and anywhere in the world for shipping plus $2. Also, to save shipping, check out my other games (here are some of them): 10 Days in Africa, 10 Days in the USA, Aggravation (Co-5 company), Anachronism (various sets), Apples to Apples Junior 9+, Apples to Apples Junior!, Apples to Apples Expansion Set #1, Barbarian (double game with Survival), Before I Kill You Mr. Bond, Bible Challenge, Bitin’ Off Hedz, Brain Strain, Brawl, Campaign, Caesar and Cleopatra, Caveat Emptor, Cheers, Chrononauts, Circus Maximus (Battleline), Civilization (Avalon Hill), Deadwood, Desert Victory, Detroit-Cleveland Grand Prix, Dilbert, Gangsters Gun Molls and G-Men, Gold Digger, Grab!, Hack! (Knights of the Dinner Table), I.Q. Derby, High Ground (new and used), Knights, Knights of Charlemagne, Life (in Monstropolis), Longstreet’s Assault, Lord of the Fries, Lord of the Rings – The Duel, Mamma Mia, Manhattan, Modern Art, My Word! (regular and Junior), Name Burst, Napoleon, Origins of World War II, Partyzone “Spy Ring”, Phase 10, Pirates (the constructible strategy game), Portable Adventures, Power Lunch, Qwitch, Rack-O, Read My Lips (Kid!), Red Empire, Scotland Yard, Seafarers of Catan 5-6 Player Expansion, Settlers of Catan Card Game, Skip-Bo, Solarquest, Space Beans, Stage II, Stock Market Game (AH – 1970), Strat-O-Matic Pro Basketball, Survival (double game with the Barbarian), Talk Show, Trailer Park Gods, Trivial Pursuit (base game and Baby Boomer edition), True Colors, Win Place and Show Zobmondo!! and Zomax.
This item is for a Geeklist auction; only purchase if you are the winner!

Looney Labs (LOO 009) The Card Game of Time Travel 136 full-color playing cards, and a rulebook, in a thick tuck box for 1-6 players 20-45 minutes ages 11 and up In Chrononauts, each player becomes a time traveler, with a unique identity and a secret mission. During the game, players travel backwards and forwards through history, doing all those things people have always dreamed of using a time machine to do: Visiting the great moments of the past, peeking into the future, collecting up impossible artifacts and priceless works of art (at the moment just before history records their destruction), coming to grips with the paradoxes of time travel, and of course, changing pivotal events and altering the course of history itself. How would the timeline be different if Lincoln and JFK had not been assassinated? And is that the version of reality that you came from originally... the one you must return to in order to win? It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s all packed into a fast and easy Fluxx-style card game that will take you to the beginning of time and back again.
With Lost Identities expansion. Buyer to pay actual shipping costs and insurance (optional) by USPS. You can check my ebay feedback, vf-00.
box scuffing

Looney Labs (LOO 009) What would YOU do with a Time Machine? Would you stop the sinking of the Titanic? Prevent the assassination of JFK? Kill Hitler before WWII? These are just a few of the possibilities in Chrononauts, the award-winning card game of time travel. To win, you must change history at key points called Linchpins, so that history transforms into the Alternate Reality your character calls home. You can also win by collecting a specific set of Artifacts, such as a live dinosaur, the Mona Lisa, and an unpublished Shakespearean play. But be careful - if you create too many paradoxes, you could destroy the entire universe!

You can also win by collecting a specific set of Artifacts, such as a live dinosaur, the Mona Lisa, and an unpublished Shakespearean play. But be careful - if you create too many paradoxes, you could destroy the entire universe!

Item Name: Chrononauts Description: Chrononauts card game from Looney Labs. Complete and in good shape. Shipping Weight: 1 lbs Orders are usually shipped within one business day of receiving payment. Shipping can be calculated by adding the weights of all games purchased together (yes, we do combine items for shipping so take a look at our other games as the cost of shipping that second or third game is small compared to the first one) and adding 1 pound for packaging materials from US zip code 60134. We ship via either the USPS or UPS. International buyers please note... shipping overseas is EXPENSIVE. For that first game (unless it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s tiny) it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll be no less than $30... additional games don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t add much to that. Please be aware of that before placing an order.

Size: Bubble Mailer Standard Information listed on all my For Sale Games: ------------------------------------------------------ 1) Shipping cost is the highest cost of all games purchased + the add on cost of each other game. Promo cards or anything else that fits in a bubble mailer will have a base cost of $5 and and an add on cost of $1, a small game has a base cost of $8 and an add on cost of $2, a medium game has a base cost of $14 and an add on cost of $3 and a large game has a base cost of $20 and add on cost of $4. Anything outside that range will be listed specifically. If you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re providing a business address to ship to, take a $1 off the shipping. 2) Purchase a $100 or more worth of games and get 5% off your total order. 3) Purchase $200 or more and get 5% off and free shipping. 4) If you see any games on my for trade list that aren_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t up for sale, feel free to ask me to add to the market. 5) Most conditions are listed as very good, all those items listed as such range from very good to like new. 6) Amazon and game store gift cards are usually accepted but please check with me first if that_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s an option you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d like to pursue. 7) I try to list editions but if an edition isn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t listed and it matters to you, please ask! If an item is bought and another edition was expected but you didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t ask, then I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m happy to refund but I can_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t cover either shipping charge.
